attributes.title: It made me get sick
attributes.review: Just opening this app made me get extremely nauseous, I then had a fever for the next few days simply from this app

attributes.title: mmm sad 😘
attributes.review: this processed cheeto surprised me yet again with literally the worst functioning app on here. every picture of the bunker boy glitched to an empty spaghetti container, don’t know what went wrong but i was utterly horrified. Scared for life😢

attributes.title: No thank you, next
attributes.review: Literally the worst app ever. If you stand for racism, the sexually assault of minors, and disgracing the United States of America, this app is for you. But other then that don’t waste your time.

attributes.title: It didn’t even let me look at stuff
attributes.review: When I went on the app it kicked me off so I couldn’t even look at it at all so I don’t like it✌️

attributes.title: Just awful!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see where the next rally was and it literally gave me the nearest dumpster rental!! I’m very very angry with this. I’m calling your manager. I’m so done with this app.😡

attributes.title: Just terrible
attributes.review: First off when I opened the app I almost threw up just no & what’s even worse is I seen a terrible orange I almost had a seizure 😔

attributes.title: buggy and bad design
attributes.review: i can barely open the app cause it’s so buggy AND when i open it, the app has an ugly face on it? kinda looks like a cheeto

attributes.title: False Advertisement
attributes.review: I thought this was a place to get different flavored cheetos🤧🤧, but alas, it’s just some man doing cosplay as a cheeto. I’m very disappointed. Can’t stand it here 😞. Also #blacklivesmatter :)

attributes.title: HORRIBLE🧍‍♀️
attributes.review: I ofc downloaded this to get info on our president but when i opened the app it showed a picture of a wrinkly old cheeto instead of Nikki Minaj (our president). disappointed.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: First of all as soon as I opened the app the first thing I saw was what I believe to be a tan Cheeto? I’m not quite sure but it was very disturbing 1/100 do not recommend.
